In-s: why don't you just add yourself to the www-data group, and go about it that way?  much simpler.
I don't know what that is. I only switched to Linux two days ago. :)

Go into users and groups, add your user to the www-data group, and you might have to change the perms of stuff in /var/www (to be writable by group instead of just owner), but that'll be the last time
